info.title: DeploymentScriptsClient
info.description: The APIs listed in this specification can be used to manage Deployment Scripts resource through the Azure Resource Manager.

get.description: Lists all deployment scripts for a given subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription Id which forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api version.

200.description: OK -- Returns a list of deployment scripts.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription Id which forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api version.

200.description: OK -- Returns a list of deployment scripts.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a deployment script with a given name.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription Id which forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: scriptName
parameters.description: Name of the deployment script.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api version.

200.description: OK -- Returns information about the deployment script.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription Id which forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: scriptName
parameters.description: Name of the deployment script.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api version.

requestBody.description: Deployment script supplied to the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a deployment script. When operation completes, status code 200 returned without content.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription Id which forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: scriptName
parameters.description: Name of the deployment script.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api version.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates deployment script tags with specified values.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription Id which forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: scriptName
parameters.description: Name of the deployment script.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api version.

requestBody.description: Deployment script resource with the tags to be updated.

200.description: OK -- Deployment script tags are updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets deployment script logs for a given deployment script name.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription Id which forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: scriptName
parameters.description: Name of the deployment script.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api version.

200.description: OK -- Returns deployment script logs if available.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets deployment script logs for a given deployment script name.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription Id which forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: scriptName
parameters.description: Name of the deployment script.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api version.

200.description: OK -- Returns deployment script logs if available.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

AzureCliScript.description: Object model for the Azure CLI script.

azCliVersion.description: Azure CLI module version to be used.

AzureCliScriptProperties.description: Properties of the Azure CLI script object.

AzurePowerShellScript.description: Object model for the Azure PowerShell script.

azPowerShellVersion.description: Azure PowerShell module version to be used.

AzurePowerShellScriptProperties.description: Properties of the Azure PowerShell script object.

id.description: String Id used to locate any resource on Azure.

AzureResourceBase.description: Common properties for all Azure resources.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

location.description: The location of the ACI and the storage account for the deployment script.

nextLink.description: The URL to use for getting the next set of results.

cleanupPreference.description: The clean up preference when the script execution gets in a terminal state. Default setting is 'Always'.

provisioningState.description: State of the script execution. This only appears in the response.

DeploymentScriptPropertiesBase.description: Common properties for the deployment script.

DeploymentScriptUpdateParameter.description: Deployment script parameters to be updated.

name.description: The name of the environment variable.

secureValue.description: The value of the secure environment variable.

value.description: The value of the environment variable.

EnvironmentVariable.description: The environment variable to pass to the script in the container instance.

log.description: Script execution logs in text format.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user-assigned managed identities associated with the resource. Key is the Azure resource Id of the managed identity.

arguments.description: Command line arguments to pass to the script. Arguments are separated by spaces. ex: -Name blue* -Location 'West US 2'

environmentVariables.description: The environment variables to pass over to the script.

forceUpdateTag.description: Gets or sets how the deployment script should be forced to execute even if the script resource has not changed. Can be current time stamp or a GUID.

primaryScriptUri.description: Uri for the script. This is the entry point for the external script.

retentionInterval.description: Interval for which the service retains the script resource after it reaches a terminal state. Resource will be deleted when this duration expires. Duration is based on ISO 8601 pattern (for example P7D means one week).

supportingScriptUris.description: Supporting files for the external script.

timeout.description: Maximum allowed script execution time specified in ISO 8601 format. Default value is PT1H

ScriptConfigurationBase.description: Common configuration settings for both Azure PowerShell and Azure CLI scripts.

endTime.description: End time of the script execution.

expirationTime.description: Time the deployment script resource will expire.

startTime.description: Start time of the script execution.

ScriptStatus.description: Generic object modeling results of script execution.

clientId.description: Client App Id associated with this identity.

principalId.description: Azure Active Directory principal ID associated with this identity.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription Id which forms part of the URI for every service call.
